rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample natural light from the east and west openings. Vastu-compliant positioning for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance hall, designed for social gatherings. Features large windows on the north side for good airflow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with south-facing windows to harness energy and warmth. Includes seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient layout on the east side as per Vastu, ensuring optimal morning light and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A modest guest room with south-west orientation to maintain privacy and ensure balanced energy. Includes en-suite bathroom.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Ensures secure, private entry, aligning with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large window for natural light and ventilation.}

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Private balcony overlooking the garden, adhering to the west-facing plot orientation.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: A discreet exit door for emergencies and service access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located in the south-east corner to balance privacy with optimal light, including an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness room on the west side of the plot for a healthy lifestyle, equipped with modern gym facilities and proper ventilation.
